title: Smart Streaming: Roku’s 4K Streaming Stick Gets New Discount Online
description: If you needed any more reason to upgrade your streaming experience from home, Roku’s current deal on its Express 4K Plus is a really good one. The new streaming device has been the go-to Roku since it first dropped last May, and is now 11% off on Amazon as part of a surprise sale, dropping […]
author: Tim Chan
excerpt: Save up to 14% off on Roku's streaming device, which offers high-quality 4K picture, fast processing and access to your favorite apps and shows.
text: If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission. If you needed any more reason to upgrade your streaming experience from home, Roku‘s current deal on its Express 4K Plus is a really good one. The new streaming device has been the go-to Roku since it first dropped last May, and is now 11% off on Amazon as part of a surprise sale, dropping the price down to just $35. Get access to Roku’s massive selection of live TV channels and streaming platforms in sharp 4K resolution for one low price. This is one of the best options for a streaming device on the market right now and the $35 price point is the cheapest Roku deal since Prime Day. AMAZON DEAL Roku Express 4K+ Streaming Device Roku’s latest streaming stick gets you content in HD, 4K, and HDR resolution, with built-in technology that optimizes sharpness, clarity and more vivid colors for your TV. This Target deals includes a voice remote for easy navigation. Roku has long been a leader in streaming devices, so it’s no surprise that customers and reviewers have been so pleased with its latest iteration. Like its earlier products, it promises a simple and easy-to-use interface, in addition to fast and responsive controls. Aside from its higher-quality streams, which uses its latest OS10 software for a crystal-clear 4K HD picture, the biggest upgrade is its ethernet support. Unlike the streaming stick, the newest device is compatible with Ethernet adapters for an optional wired connection. The new software also allows for zippier processing; switching between different platforms such as Disney Plus, Apple TV, Netflix, or Youtube TV, among others, has never been faster. Reviewers have also raved about how well Roku handles Airplay, which can often have buffering issues on other devices. Plus, the updated remote comes with voice control for hands-free browsing. Get the Roku 4K streaming deal here. AMAZON DEAL Roku Ultra Ultimate Streaming Device There might be reason for you to opt for Roku’s other streaming devices too right now, as the more powerful Roku Ultra is currently 14% off at Amazon. The Roku Ultra delivers the same 4k streaming experience as the Roku Express only optimized with Dolby Vision, which offers bolder highlights and incredible contrast. Dolby Atmos sound, meantime, delivers a more immersive audio experience, inspired by the same Dolby technology seen in the big-chain movie theaters across the counry. Roku calls this their “fastest, most powerful Roku player ever.” This Target deal gets you the Roku Ultra streaming device, a voice remote, HDMI cable and included rechargeable battery. See full details here.

If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

If you needed any more reason to upgrade your streaming experience from home, Roku‘s current deal on its Express 4K Plus is a really good one.

The new streaming device has been the go-to Roku since it first dropped last May, and is now 11% off on Amazon as part of a surprise sale, dropping the price down to just $35. Get access to Roku’s massive selection of live TV channels and streaming platforms in sharp 4K resolution for one low price. This is one of the best options for a streaming device on the market right now and the $35 price point is the cheapest Roku deal since Prime Day.

AMAZON DEAL

Roku Express 4K+ Streaming Device

Roku’s latest streaming stick gets you content in HD, 4K, and HDR resolution, with built-in technology that optimizes sharpness, clarity and more vivid colors for your TV. This Target deals includes a voice remote for easy navigation.

Roku has long been a leader in streaming devices, so it’s no surprise that customers and reviewers have been so pleased with its latest iteration. Like its earlier products, it promises a simple and easy-to-use interface, in addition to fast and responsive controls. Aside from its higher-quality streams, which uses its latest OS10 software for a crystal-clear 4K HD picture, the biggest upgrade is its ethernet support. Unlike the streaming stick, the newest device is compatible with Ethernet adapters for an optional wired connection.

The new software also allows for zippier processing; switching between different platforms such as Disney Plus, Apple TV, Netflix, or Youtube TV, among others, has never been faster. Reviewers have also raved about how well Roku handles Airplay, which can often have buffering issues on other devices. Plus, the updated remote comes with voice control for hands-free browsing. Get the Roku 4K streaming deal here.

AMAZON DEAL

Roku Ultra Ultimate Streaming Device

There might be reason for you to opt for Roku’s other streaming devices too right now, as the more powerful Roku Ultra is currently 14% off at Amazon. The Roku Ultra delivers the same 4k streaming experience as the Roku Express only optimized with Dolby Vision, which offers bolder highlights and incredible contrast. Dolby Atmos sound, meantime, delivers a more immersive audio experience, inspired by the same Dolby technology seen in the big-chain movie theaters across the counry.

Roku calls this their “fastest, most powerful Roku player ever.” This Target deal gets you the Roku Ultra streaming device, a voice remote, HDMI cable and included rechargeable battery. See full details here.
